meanings.definition: The amount that a sink can hold.
meanings.sent1: I filled the sink with water until it was at sinkfuls.
meanings.sent2: After doing the dishes, the sink was full to sinkfuls.
meanings.sent3: My cat decided to take a nap in the sinkfuls of water.
meanings.sent4: The sinkfuls of dirty dishes seemed to never end.
meanings.sent5: The overflowing sinkfuls of bubbles made a soapy mess on the floor.

meanings.definition: The act of filling a sink with water or dishes.
meanings.sent1: She began the sinkfuls of water for washing the vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The sinkfuls of dishes waiting to be washed seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent3: The sinkfuls of water splashed everywhere as he tried to do the dishes.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed in the kitchen as she played with the sinkfuls of bubbles.
meanings.sent5: The sinkfuls of plates clattered noisily as they were stacked in the cupboard.
